item.title: Billy Joel HBO Documentary Trailer Highlights Classical Music to “Uptown Girl” Journey Amid “Hard Lessons”: “Life Is a Fight”
item.description: The two-part expansive portrait of the iconic musician, ‘And So It Goes’ will air across two weeks later this month, clocking in at a total of five hours, and features interviews with Joel, his friend

item.title: Justin Bieber’s ‘Swag’: A Track-by-Track Breakdown
item.description: R&Bieber is back for his first album in four years: a 21-track collection that’s both earnest and doesn’t take itself too seriously.

item.title: Justin Bieber’s ‘Swag’: A Track-by-Track Breakdown
item.description: R&Bieber is back for his first album in four years: a 21-track collection that’s both earnest and doesn’t take itself too seriously.

item.title: ATEEZ Partners Up With Amazon Music for In Your Fantasy Tour Merchandise
item.description: The eight-piece K-pop sensation kicked off the North American leg of their world tour in Atlanta Thursday night.

item.title: Travis Scott Reveals Sunday Release Date for ‘Jackboys 2’
item.description: “The Jack is back with 17 tracks full of trunk rattling classics in the making,” reads the album promo art Scott shared Thursday night.
